scenario.name: Chiamata Base abbatte il chiamante UAS
scenario.send: SIP/2.0 100 Trying [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=SIPP_SimulatorePVR_[field1]_[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Max-Forwards: 70 Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, MESSAGE, OPTIONS, BYE, UPDATE, REFER, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, SERVICE, INFO

SIP/2.0 180 Ringing [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=SIPP_SimulatorePVR_[field1]_[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]> Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, MESSAGE, OPTIONS, BYE, UPDATE, REFER, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, SERVICE, INFO [last_P-Charging-Function-Addresses:] [last_P-Charging-Vector:] Rseq: 1 Require: 100rel Supported: timer Content-Length: [len]

SIP/2.0 200 OK Via: [$10] From: [$2] To: [$3] [last_call-ID:] [last_Supported:] [$4] [last_Server:] Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];user=phone>;audio;+g.3gpp.icsi-ref="urn%3Aurn-7%3A3gpp-service.ims.icsi.mmtel" Content-Type: application/sdp Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, MESSAGE, OPTIONS, BYE, UPDATE, REFER, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, SERVICE, INFO User-Agent: SIP Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=ntzum 0 3 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8

exec.command: echo ---------- Test Canale Chiamante verso Chiamato #OK# -------- >> Esiti.log
echo ---------- Test Canale Chiamante verso Chiamato #KO# -------- >> Esiti.log

scenario.send:
INFO sip:[field1]@telecomitalia.it SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] To: [$2] From: [$3] Max-Forwards: 70 [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: 1 INFO Content-Type: application/dtmf-relay Content-Length: 24
Signal=2 Duration=250

exec.command: echo ---------- Test Terminato con esito positivo lato Server #OK# -------- >> Esiti.log
